snippet: The Legislature on Monday overrode Gov. Bev Perdue’s veto of legislation that rolls back a state law giving death row prisoners a way to seek a reduced sentence because of racial bias.
abstract: North Carolina's Legislature overrides Gov Bev Perdue’s veto of legislation that rolls back a state law giving death row prisoners a way to seek a reduced sentence because of racial bias.
lead_paragraph: The Legislature on Monday overrode Gov. Bev Perdue’s veto of legislation that rolls back a state law giving death row prisoners a way to seek a reduced sentence because of racial bias.

headline.main: North Carolina: Bias Law Scaled Back
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: Bias Law Scaled Back
